attributes.title: RIP WORMY
attributes.review: My pet Wormy was a huge 🍊 supporter and he is a worm but he got shirts for 🍊as banners but then him and I had an argument about how i needed to make dinner so my poor pet worm walked away and while he was gone I had to burn his🍊stuff so he got this app and had a heart attack on how dIsGuStInG 🍊 is and i’m glad this made him realize 🍊 is gross but only 14 minutes after he got this app he died of a heart attack😭 this app causes bad luck! RIP WORMY😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭❌❌❌❌❌❌❌🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: I lost my toe
attributes.review: This dude decided to go ahead and make an app which caused my grandma to have a seizures of the app she said the app had to much brightness even with the brightness all the way down and my grandma is currently in the hospital fighting fo her life to just recover from this horrible delete this app if you don’t want your mom grandma or even family member to die protect for family at all costs

attributes.title: K
attributes.review: This is THE WORST APP in the history of apps. I wanted to learn more about our wonderful amazing savior Mr. Orange. Instead, the screen glitched and now its stuck loading forever! My phone ended up shattering cause it saw some weird dude. But it’s okay. I absolutely adore Mr. Orange and would do anything for him!...? It...? Nevermind. Anyway. I personally am very republican and I don’t know what these liberals are up to! Mocking THE Mr. Orange! I would NEVER. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk 💋💅🏻👑✨

attributes.title: I died and came back
attributes.review: I proceeded to download the app but opening the app caused my permanent blindness. I went to get my blood work later that day and found out I had a blood infection due to holding my phone with the app open. My brain later short circuited due to the foolery the app possessed, I read the name of the app but proceeded to die in the middle of reading Trump- ☠️ I came back to write this review, I will now die. Peace bruh 👻

This is The worst app in America how About Donald Trump makes the app great again I mean seriously this was so bad right when I got it downloaded I just read some of the stuff and then deleted it because I saw how terrible trash it was it made my phone glitch it made everything worse happen and trust me if you download this app I’m praying for you because this app is terrible🤬🤢🤮😷🖕🏽

attributes.title: Technical malfunctions
attributes.review: This app has caused irreversible brain damage. I hate the way it’s set up and I hate the face of that old man when you first open up!! Like could they have not gotten a better looking model for the face of the app? Also I heard that trump is a rapist... not sure if this is true but if it is he has lost all of my support and respect!! He has no right to invade women’s privacy like that!!

attributes.title: Just No
attributes.review: Honestly, this app just keeps on getting worse and worse. It bugs out constantly, isn't even relevant half the time, and focuses on 🤢 Trump 🤢 I keep seeing more and more of how Trump is letting the people down on this app and I just cant take it anymore. This app is ridiculous and Trump is downright awful. I will not support this app now the person it is based on. Just no.

attributes.title: Failure to our country.
attributes.review: This man who is our President has ruined the nation and pushed it into the furthest state of disarray this country has ever been in, he is an incompetent fat sad man child. This app made my phone over heat and it constantly crashes and ever since I’ve downloaded it my phone seems to be taking data from my phone that I did not give it permission to. This man is spying on his citizens!

attributes.title: Absolutely messed up my phone!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it made my phone start to glitch.😡Like people started talking about how he was going to take down TikTok and I was like nahhhh this has to be part of the glitch from his app bc there’s no way that’s gonna go down without a fight. 🤬But uh other than that the app hasn’t rlly worked right and now my phone is messed up!!!😔

attributes.title: Get what you pay for
attributes.review: Wow I was so excited to download this app but I’m so sad to report I found some crazy stuff. It’s filled with lies and false promises. “Keep America great” does that mean letting more people die from the virus? Oh my bad it’s just a hoax created by the leftist gen zers who are going to decide our futures so we should keep hating on them. But I think with this app you get what you pay for, nothing.
